Uses of Package
fgl.cards

  • Classes in fgl.cards used by fgl.cards 
    Class and Description
    Card
    The Card class represents a card object with an assigned suite and letter or number.
    CardBank
    The CardBank class represents a collection of Cards that are used in the game application.
    Controller
    The Controller manages the game application.
    CustomButton
    Customised menu buttons.
    CustomButtonBank
    The CustomButtonBank class represents a collection of Custom Buttons that are used in the game application.
    FGLGraphic
    This superclass represents all custom graphic objects that are added to the game screen.
    GameBoardLayout 
    Player
    Copyright (c) 2011 FUMBA GAME LAB.
    SoundBank
    Manages all the game sounds and effects (FX).
    TextViewBank
    The CardBank class represents a collection of Cards that are used in the game application.
